meta.title: ANK&ILUMER: Innovation and Quality in Disposable Hygiene
meta.desc: Get to know ANK&ILUMER, a leading company in the manufacturing of disposable hygiene products, with over 30 years of experience. Discover our growth journey and commitment to sustainability and innovation.

meta.journey: ANK&ILUMER: From China to the World
meta.journey-desc: Explore the success story of ANK&ILUMER, from its foundation to global expansion with five factories in China, always prioritizing quality in disposable hygiene products.
meta.products: ANK&ILUMER: Quality and Sustainability in Every Detail
meta.products-desc: Discover the complete range of hygiene products from ANK&ILUMER, including diapers, disposable underwear, and wet wipes. Products developed with cutting-edge technology and environmental responsibility.
meta.contact-desc: Contact the ANK&ILUMER team to learn more about our products, services, and business opportunities. Fast and efficient customer support for distributors and partners.
meta.inovation-desc: Learn more about ANK&ILUMER’s commitment to sustainability. Discover our eco-friendly products, such as biodegradable diapers and wet wipes, that care for both your well-being and the environment.

HomePage.image-p: SINCE 1986, BUILDING LASTING RELATIONSHIPS BASED ON TRUST; WITH EFFICIENCY AND TRANSPARENCY.
HomePage.desc: 2024 All rights reserved. Developed by WBusiness
HomePage.ank-p: In an increasingly interconnected and dynamic world, values such as ethics, responsibility, and sustainability become essential for our success. Ethics guide our actions, ensuring that all our decisions are fair and transparent.
HomePage.raw-p1: At ANK&ILUMER, we are committed to providing high-quality raw materials for the hygiene and personal care industry. Our raw materials range from TNT to bamboo fibers. This diversity of materials allows us to create products that not only meet but exceed our customers' expectations in terms of comfort, absorption, and environmental respect.
HomePage.white-p: ANK&ILUMER offers white-label services, allowing other companies to sell products under their own brands, including a full range of hygiene and personal care products.

contact.cost-p: Welcome to our Customer Care service! We are here to ensure that your experience with us is exceptional. Our dedicated team is ready to answer your questions, solve any issues, and listen to your feedback with care.
contact.name: Company
contact.name-erro: The name must have at least 3 letters.
contact.message-erro: The message must contain at least 10 characters.
contact.ok: Thank you for sending us your information. We look forward to speaking with you soon...

products.raw-p: In ANK&ILUMER, we are committed to providing high-quality raw materials for the hygiene and personal care industry. Our raw materials range from TNT to bamboo fibers.
products.white-p: ANK&ILUMER offers White Label services, allowing other companies to sell their products under their own brands; this includes a complete range of hygiene and personal care products.

al-wl.h1: a&l white label disposable adult underwear
al-wl.li-1-p: The super-absorbent core instantly locks in liquid, significantly reducing sores and skin rashes.
al-wl.li-2-p: The 3D anti-leak barriers prevent side and back leaks. The dual absorbent layers keep the skin dry and clean at all times. The extra-soft cover prevents leakage.
al-wl.li-3-p: The hypoallergenic fabric containing aloe vera, chamomile, and vitamin E maintains healthy skin.
al-wl.li-4-p: Advanced anti-odor technology helps reduce odors that form during and after use, preventing rashes and smells.
al-wl.li-5-p: For greater comfort, we use a soft, breathable material, and a top sheet with air-capturing technology, significantly reducing the likelihood of bedsores.
al-wl.li-6-p: The moisture indicator reminds you when to change the underwear, preventing skin irritation issues.

journey.t-2: Start of ANK (HK) activities - Merger of 'ANK' and 'Ilumer'
journey.t-3: ANK & ILUMER starts operations in Latin America and opens its first factory in China
journey.p1: In an increasingly interconnected and dynamic world, the values of ethics, responsibility and sustainability become essential for the success of any business. Ethics guides our actions, ensuring that our decisions are fair and transparent. Responsibility reminds us of the importance of respond for our actions, being aware of the impacts that we generate on the environment and society.
journey.p2: Since 1986, ILUMER S.A. has been dedicated to the commercialization of disposable hygiene products and raw materials.
journey.p3: Rooted in the personal hygiene industry since 2011, with six production bases in China, the ANK HYGIENE holding is an international reference in products, raw materials and machinery for the disposable hygiene industry.
journey.p4: One of the main markets of interest is Latin America. With this objective in mind, and after years of continuous work, we formed the joint venture ANK ILUMER (A&I);
journey.p2-1: A&I is dedicated to improving people's quality of life through innovative and responsible products.
journey.p5-1: A&I is dedicated to improving people's quality of life through innovative and responsible products.
journey.p5: Our main differential is in our team of professionals. The excellence in the quality of the products offered is the result of a continuous commitment to personal improvement; marked by seriousness and dedication.
journey.p6: Collaboration is a fundamental value as we recognize that together we are stronger and capable of achieving exceptional results. Finally, commitment is the foundation that sustains all these values, demonstrating our dedication and continuous effort to achieve our goals and contribute to a better world. By integrating these principles into our daily lives, we build a solid foundation for a prosperous and harmonious future.
journey.modal-h1: Our factories are GMP certified and dust-free.
journey.modal-1: Machines for the disposable hygiene products industry.
journey.modal-2: Raw materials for the disposable hygiene products industry.
journey.modal-3: Disposable products for personal hygiene and pets.
journey.modal-4: Disposable diapers for adults and children.
journey.inov-p: Innovation is one of the fundamental pillars of our company. We constantly seek ways to improve and evolve. It is not just about technological advances but also innovations in business models, management practices, marketing strategies and, even, continuous advances in our organizational culture.
journey.susten-p: We are committed to preserving natural resources for future generations by adopting practices that minimize environmental impact. The search of quality in everything we do ensures the delivery of products and services that meet or exceed our customers' expectations.
journey.end: Innovation is a crucial factor for sustainability. We are committed to developing solutions that optimize the use of natural resources, reduce environmental impact, and promote social well-being.

modal.f1-name: Factory of Machines for the industry
modal.f1-l1: With our own headquarters, we operate in the segment of machines for making disposable geriatric and infant diapers and pants; hospital masks; feminine pads, and of various other personal hygiene products.
modal.f1-l2: We have teams dedicated to continuous research and development to produce machines with greater reliability, durability, and above all, productivity.
modal.f1-l3: Our design team is the source of the innovative ideas and solutions implemented in all machines. Our engineers are always up-to-date with the latest market trends.
modal.f2-l1: We produce non-woven fabric (TNT), PE film, absorbent core, plastic bags, tapes, siliconized paper, perforated film, etc. We also commercialize SAP and Hotmelt under our own brand.
modal.f2-l9: Research & Development department and raw material production
modal.f3-l1: In this manufacturing unit, we produce hospital masks, feminine pads, disposable absorbent panties, pants, pads, wet wipes, cotton pads, tissue paper, pet diapers, etc.
modal.f4-l1: We manufacture disposable pants and bed protectors for adults. Disposable diapers and pants for babies.
modal.f5-l1: In this manufacturing unit, we produce sheets, bath and face towels, underwear, etc.
modal.f6-l1: We manufacture shampoo, conditioner, and cream for hair care; body moisturizer, etc.
modal.f6-l2: Personal Care Products Factory with 100,000 m²
modal.f6-l3: Production of diapers for babies and adults

politics.p1-1: ANK-ILUMER is committed to protecting the privacy of users and ensuring the security of personal information collected on our website. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information.
politics.p1-3: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide, such as your name, email, and phone number. We may also collect browsing data, such as your IP address, browser type, and pages visited.
politics.p1-5: The information collected is used to:
politics.p1-6: ● Process orders and respond to inquiries.
politics.p1-7: ● Improve website performance and user experience.
politics.p1-name-4: ● Send relevant communications such as updates and offers
politics.p1-9: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as necessary to fulfill legal obligations or provide services, such as product delivery.
politics.p1-11: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, loss, or disclosure.
politics.p1-13: You have the right to access, correct, or request deletion of your personal data at any time. To exercise these rights, please contact us at: info@ank-ilumer.com.
politics.t1-1: The ANK & ILUMER network of sites consists of various websites and pages, managed by ANK & ILUMER or its affiliates. Use of these sites implies acceptance of the terms, conditions, and notices presented here without alteration. Using ANK & ILUMER sites indicates agreement with all terms and conditions. Use of specific sites within the ANK & ILUMER network may be subject to additional terms found on those sites. In case of conflict, the specific site terms will prevail.
politics.t1-2: ANK & ILUMER reserves the right to change the terms, conditions, and notices under which its sites are offered, including fees associated with the use of the sites. It is the user's responsibility to review these terms regularly.
politics.t1-3: ANK & ILUMER sites are for personal and non-commercial use. It is not allowed to alter, copy, distribute, transmit, display, reproduce, publish, license, create derivative works, transfer, or sell any information, software, products, or services obtained from these sites without prior written permission. Harassment and impersonation of others are prohibited. Uploading illegal, abusive, or objectionable content is not allowed. Use of the site for commercial solicitations is also prohibited.
politics.t1-4: The sites may contain links to external sites managed by third parties. ANK & ILUMER does not control these sites and is not responsible for their privacy practices or content. The use of these links is at the user's own risk.
politics.t1-5: ANK & ILUMER makes no warranties regarding the accuracy or completeness of the content of the sites. The site and materials are provided 'as is' and without any express or implied warranties. ANK & ILUMER's liability for any damages arising from the use of the sites is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law.
